snippet: Anna Gristina, who is charged with running a multimillion-dollar prostitution ring, bragged about her ties to law enforcement, officials said.
abstract: Anna Gristina, who bragged that she had contacts in law enforcement who would tip her off if she came under scrutiny, is arrested and charged with running a million-dollar prostitution ring in Manhattan; case is built from five-year investigation by district attorney's unit that pursues cases against the police and other uniformed city workers.
lead_paragraph: Anna Gristina, who is charged with running a multimillion-dollar prostitution ring, bragged about her ties to law enforcement, officials said.

headline.seo: Woman Ran Manhattan Prostitution Ring, Prosecutors Say
